text: José Maria da Cruz Martins (born 4 December 1973), better known as Pelé, is a football manager who coaches Casa de Portugal em MacauWeekend® - Macau Daily Times and a retired footballer who played as a forward. Born in São Tomé and Príncipe prior to it becoming independent from Portugal, he moved first to the metropole and then to Macau, which was Portuguese as well (now a special administrative region of China). Being there, he has played for GD Rubro Negro, GD Lam Pak, Dynasty/Vong Chiu, Vá Luen, FC Porto Macau, Casa de Portugal and for the senior Macau national team. He has also played in India for Goa-based clubs Vasco SC and Churchill Brothers SC. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Portuguese people of São Tomé and Príncipe descent Category:Association football forwards Category:Macau footballers Category:Macau people of São Tomé and Príncipe descent Category:G.D. title: Pelé (footballer, born 1973)
